unittitle_ssm: Murray Bookchin Manuscript for Free Cities: Communalism and the Left
abstract_ssm: Murray Bookchin (1921-2006) was an American anarchist and social ecologist. This collection contains the manuscript for his final book, Free Cities: Communalism and the Left, published by Pluto Press in 2008.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
collection_ssm: Murray Bookchin Manuscript for Free Cities: Communalism and the Left
